articles.title: How QR codes work and what makes them dangerous - a computer scientist explains
articles.description: The data in a QR code is a series of dots in a square grid. Each dot represents a one and each blank a zero in binary code, and the patterns encode sets of numbers, letters or both, including URLs.

articles.description: Citing price pressures the central bank bumped up inflation forecasts and cut growth forecasts, but said it would have a `nimble footed’ approach to liquidity as it introduced the Standing Deposit Facility to manage the excess in the system.

articles.author: Sunainaa Chadha
articles.title: Key takeaways from RBI policy meet
articles.description: The Reserve Bank of India on Friday left key rates unchanged at 4 percent and maintained an accommodative stance as the ongoing Russia-Ukraine conflict has pushed up the cost of commodities internationally, resulting in a higher inflationary trend globally.
articles.content: Brace to pay higher prices this year for oil, chicken, milk, fuel: Key takeaways from RBI policy meet
